title: Culture: Activities (Usefulness 2)
description: Traveler usefulness 2/10 phrases for the Activities subcategory within Culture. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: There are a lot of good hot springs in Japan.
cards.romaji: Nihon ni wa takusan ii onsen ga aru.
cards.japanese: 日本にはたくさんいい温泉がある。
